subject: HS Pro Shifter Shipping
description_text:
Hello,

I purchased a HS Pro Shifter on December 10th. I thought I saw a message
about orders shipping out after the 15th of December. I still have not
received any order updates on the item. My order number is #SSN4524 - Just
wanted to see if I could get a more accurate idea on when this item will
ship out.

Thank you!

-Aaron Templin

conversations.body_text: Hi Aaron T,  Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.Â
